name: Christ is King
short: Based Christian server for those who love Christ our Lord!
long: This community was made to be a loving and kind fellowship server, don't be toxic here. Reflect the love of Christ in all conversation. Please keep in mind this is not a debate server.

name: rolled's Lair
short: A community server for people to talk in.
long: rolled's Lair is a community server for people to talk in and have fun in. In the server, you can share your art, share your (un)funny memes, test things, and more.

name: 45Community
short: A Revolt server for talking, finding new friends and just for having fun!
long: 45Community is a new Revolt server for everyone. Here you can talk about anything you want - anime, programming, gaming, music and much more! Have fun!

name: miHoYo Community Server
short: This Community Server is meant for anybody interested in miHoYo and their games.
long: Want to talk about miHoYo in a whole simply use our #miHoYo Talk channel or want to talk about any of their games then just go to any of the games text channels on our server.

name: LinuxOS - FR
short: Linux - Gaming - Hacking
long: A French Linux Tech Community

name: soafencord
short: official community surrounding soafen as a content creator
long: a community space for average soafen enjoyers to chat - this compliments the Discord server and Matrix space.

name: Penguin Chill
short: A CPPS for chillin with your buds on a rainy day.
long: Penguin Chill is a fun CPPS with events and new stuff weekly and more dance contests are my fav!

name: ftmd - anarchy
short: An anarchy Revolt server. What can go wrong.
long: Hey look! An original idea totally not stolen from a certain minecraft server that just so happens to be the oldest minecraft anarchy server.

name: Jeosty Hub
short: My server for help to users and more
long: We can help to user in server for about of revolt and more, like it : coding , translating , music , lesson etc.

name: Revolt Germany
short: Revolt Germany is a meeting place for Germans and English people alike
long: Revolt Germany is a server for every German person to speak in their Native language aswell as for English people.

name: /dev/ass
short: Russian community of programmers and linuxoids.
long: Russian community programmers and linux users where you can help with problems, as well as participate in the dispute.

name: nekos.best API
short: Official Server for the nekos.best API.
long: Join now and ask any questions about the API. Otherwise you can also chat with other people or share your Nekos.

name: CatSquad
short: Russian server about Open Source, GNU/Linux, etc.
long: **CatSquad** -  is a russian Revolt server, about **Open Source, GNU/Linux**, programming, anime, games and even politics.

name: Revolt Android
short: A Revolt server for Android enthusiasts!
long: We welcome anyone who has an interest in Android and also those who use Android. We can also try and help you with any questions you may have about Android or if you are willing to jump ship from iOS ;)

name: Snazzah's Hangout
short: Snazzah's server for things Snazzah related.
long: Snazzah's server to hangout in. It also is the server for Snazzah's projects and bots.

long: KSP World is the first South Korea community server & for KeepSOBP viewers üëÄ

long: sientete libre de hablar con gente que hable tu idioma!

name: Megumin's Dungeon
short: Server full of people like that hugs
long: Just a quiet place to hang out and chat about stuff like hugs :)

name: Centra Bot
short: Support & development community for Centra: A powerful moderation & utility bot
long: This server is the official space for support and to discuss development about Centra, a powerful moderation & utility bot for Revolt servers. We also have a friendly little community to be a part of, and are happy to help you out with development questions, bot questions, or to have a good chat.

name: Tech Mahal
short: A group of tech enthusiasts that doesn't take themselves too seriously.
long: A group of tech enthusiasts that doesn't take themselves too seriously.  We mostly talk about Linux and other technologies.

name: osu!
short: Unofficial server for those who like osu!
long: This server is designed for osu! players to hang out and chat as well as share scores and help each other improve! Everyone is welcome from all rank ranges, even if you are restricted.

name: Portugal
short: A community for all Portugueses using Revolt
long: If you are Portuguese or would love to know more about Portugal and speak with other natives, you will be more than welcome to join our server.

name: ~Nya
short: The Revolt version of the original Discord server for the Bot \*Purr*
long: This is the official Revolt server of the original ~Nya Server on Discord, home of the Discord bot \*Purr*.

name: Unix
short: Linux and Unix related discussions.
long: Unix Revolt is a server about everything Unix! If you are an enthusiast, or interested about Linux and other Unix or Unix-like systems, feel free to join!

name: The Dutch Revolt
short: The first Dutch community on Revolt!
long: Welcome to the Dutch Revolt! To gain more traction in the Netherlands, we want to present to you the first Revolt server where Dutch is the primary language.

name: Pawelek's Home
short: ‚ú®Relax and write!
long: A community server for everyone, there will be a place for foreigners, e.g. Russia, Poland, England and many more.

name: miencraft server
short: A minecraft server
long: This is a Minecraft-related server. You can discuss game updates, find someone to play with, advertise your realm/server and do much more here. We welcome players of all platforms.
